__TOC__

Adam Porr lives in Columbus, OH. He can usually be found destroying things and rebuilding them at 'Freegeek Columbus (http://freegeekcolumbus.org), a non-profit organization dedicated to bridging the digital divide and promoting reuse and recycling of used computers.

More information is available at http://www.illona.org/adam/
